name: Sleepwalking
summary: Sleepwalking is a snowy adventure across 3 MBF21 maps that exists because Ravendesk made a few midis and wanted to make maps to accompany them. UV is designed to be somewhat challenging, but fair (think mid Valiant to mid Sunlust difficulty-wise). HMP should be very accessible to most players, while HNTR is a walk in the park for those who just want to enjoy a snowy landscape. Whichever difficulty you choose, expect to receive a buffed weapon roster that should help you to deal with the opposing monster forces.
